author: Michelle Nichols
title: U.N. Security Council meets over coronavirus as it struggles to act
description: The United Nations Security Council met for the first time on Thursday to discuss the coronavirus pandemic as the 15-member body - charged with maintaining international peace and security - struggles to agree on whether it should take any action.
content: NEW YORK (Reuters) - The United Nations Security Council met for the first time on Thursday to discuss the coronavirus pandemic as the 15-member body - charged with maintaining international peace and security - struggles to agree on whether it should take an… [+4488 chars]
